title: Transforming cassava peels into animal feed

subtasks: Sorting cassava peels
Grating cassava peels
Pressing grated peels using plastic woven bags and hydraulic jack
Allowing fermented cassava peel cake to stand overnight
Sieving cassava peel cake to separate into fine and coarse fractions
Drying cassava peel products (wet cake, fine mash, coarse mash) for desired moisture content
Storing processed cassava peels}
